io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class CustomEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Effect
      • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.CustomEffect
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StaticEffect

    public class CustomEffect
extends Effect

    Custom effects allow for highly customizable animation to be designed. A custom effect is made up of a sequence of frames defined for each panel, where each frame has a color and a set time that it takes to transition to that color.

    The CustomEffect class provides methods for creating and interacting with custom effects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CustomEffect.Builder
      The custom effect builder makes it easy to programmatically design custom effects.

    • Method Detail

      • createCustomEffect

        public static CustomEffect createCustomEffect(java.lang.String name,
                                              java.lang.String animData,
                                              boolean loop)
        Creates a new custom effect. Animation data must be created without the API. Refer to the OpenAPI documentation (section 3.2.6.1) for more information.
        Parameters:
        name - the desired name of the new effect
        animData - the animation data for the effect
        loop - whether the effect should loop or not
        Returns:
        a new custom effect

      • getAnimationData

        public java.lang.String getAnimationData()
        Returns the raw animation data string.
        Returns:
        the animation data

      • setAnimationData

        public void setAnimationData(java.lang.String animData)
        Sets the raw animation data string.
        Parameters:
        animData - the animation data

      • isLoopEnabled

        public boolean isLoopEnabled()
        Checks whether or not the effect will loop when displayed on a device.
        Returns:
        true, if loop is enabled, or false if loop is disabled

      • setLoopEnabled

        public void setLoopEnabled(boolean loop)
        Enables or disables looping for the effect.
        Parameters:
        loop - whether looping should be enabled or not

        public static CustomEffect fromJSON(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Creates a new custom effect from JSON.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a new custom effect
